Hi, all,
 
I am new to JUnit. And I am running the JUnit plug-in in Eclipse=
. It's Eclipse 3.0 and JUnit 3.8.1 on Windows XP.
 
And I found some strang=
e failure when running the junit.samples.AllTests. Apart from the 
ordinary=
 failures that the documentation(and FAQ) mentions, I found these failures =
that are not mentioned:
 at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Na=
tive Method)
 at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAc=
cessorImpl.java:39)
 at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Del=
egatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
 
And when I double click on the above f=
ailures I don't get directed to the class file and instead get a "class fil=
e editor" error
which says:
"Source not found: 
The source attachment does =
not contain the source for the file NativeMethodAccessImpl
You can change t=
he source attachment  by clicking Change Attached Source below:"
(Clicking =
on all other failures would direct me to the according file)
Now even googl=
e "NativeMethodAccessImpl" doesn't return anything. Am I missing something =
here?
 
 
The whole failure trace is posted as below:
